title: How to Trace a Template Onto Fabric for Quilting

steps.headline: Draw your template as required by the pattern.
Place a sheet of sandpaper on a firm, large surface.
steps.description: The sandpaper stabilizes the fabric while you trace the template onto it.

steps.headline: Lay the fabric right side down onto the sandpaper.
Trace around the template straight onto the fabric using sewing chalk or marker.
Repeat as many times as required for your pattern.
steps.description: Proceed to cutting out the quilt pieces and making the quilt.

text: Draw your template as required by the pattern.  Place a sheet of sandpaper on a firm, large surface. The sandpaper stabilizes the fabric while you trace the template onto it. Lay the fabric right side down onto the sandpaper.  Trace around the template straight onto the fabric using sewing chalk or marker.  Repeat as many times as required for your pattern. Proceed to cutting out the quilt pieces and making the quilt.
